Html:
Hello Radioman,

Its nice to see the demos that come with every release download, but it would be really helpful if you could publish the source code for them too. Maybe even throw some sample code onto the discussion forum once in a while so we could work out some of the changes?

For example you have obviously changed the way you define marker types, but without any documentation or sample code its pretty hard to work out what they are.

Thanks in advance

David
